content.text:
Below is the comprehensive answer based on the information provided on the Firecrawl deep research page:

• The webpage indicates that the Deep Research API taps into data gathered from more than 100 sources. 

Thus, among the options you listed (80, 90, or 100+), the answer is 100+ sources. 

If you’re looking to confirm more details or wish to explore how these sources are integrated into the research process, you might consider checking the official documentation or the announcement details on the Firecrawl website.
